name: Touhou MONEY STOCKS SHOPS
description:

Story

What's come to Lotus land is an unprecedented backgammon boom!
Buildings, nature, and even the moon can be remade into SUGOROKU squares throughout Lotus land!
Is this some sort of aberration?
The Touhou characters' money game begins now!

Introduction to the game

1: The girls (players) roll the dice on their turn to buy land or increase their capital This is a game of the so-called Monopoly series in which you develop the The game can be played by up to 4 players.

2: The girls have to collect 5 marks placed on the stage. If you collect all the marks (or 4 marks) and return to the moneylender, you get the prize!

3: When stopping at or passing a moneylender, the girls can purchase a certain amount of stock in each area. You can. Stock prices go up and down with purchases and capital increases, so use it well to make money!

4: After rolling the dice, the girls set them up before each turn of the die roll, as if they were speca You can swing a fortune with a lot of money in it.
You can get your fortune by stopping at a marked square or at someone else's shop. Use the amulets to get around!

5: Each character has a set of passive skills and amulets available to them, and you will be able to get different You'll get a great gaming experience. Choose from a wide range of play styles to find the one that's right for you!

6: I've created a system that allows you to set your amulets and check your shares even while other characters are on their turns, so you can play the game at a fast pace!

7: Single-player against the CPU is possible, but you can also play multiplayer with friends using P2P communication. (If there are not enough people, the CPU can play.)You can even do it. Let's show them what you can do!
